attributes.contentHtml:
Hello NotEthan,

A short answer, it is totally your willingness to or not to wait. If you look back in the history, there are many things planned to release but keep being delayed or just end up not happening at all. However, that does not make him committed a crime or fraud.

Best Regards,
AllSafe

AllSafe hello!
thats true! many good hostings took months to release!
many good hosts even took longer then that!
but thats not what i am talking about...
these people i find are people i actually know...
they are scammers and we all know a scammer cant be trusted

lets say you opened fraud hostings before... and your rep went bad
lets say that every time u opened a hosting...everyone knew its not gonna release
its the same case here...but not everyone knows thier scam... as i know the owner called "Sagnik Das"
who abuses and he did told me about it cuz at that time we were friends
that "sagnik " is the owner of nixxon (is reopening) and yeah...
but a few days ago he asked me what job i did and wanted me to get them that job so he can earn money...
i clearly said "no" and that lead us to not bieng friends anymore
now if the guy is poor....if the guy dont have nodes...how can ya tell me they are legit on making the host...
OFC legend hostings like lush (not so sure but i think so) and i think cygen was too took some time...
its a fraud if they are just lying to thier members for more members and advertise thier socials...

Its illegal...
now i dont have anything bad with ya but am just saying i see u on many threads and see u protecting the other scam/suspects hostings...
no offense but i think you should do the digging too...
ty!
